parametrized_description: Maximize the total caloric intake by selecting the number of cups of spinach and soybeans. This involves maximizing CaloriesSpinach multiplied by the number of cups of spinach plus CaloriesSoybeans multiplied by the number of cups of soybeans. The selection must satisfy the following constraints: FiberSpinach multiplied by the number of cups of spinach plus FiberSoybeans multiplied by the number of cups of soybeans is at least MinFiber, IronSpinach multiplied by the number of cups of spinach plus IronSoybeans multiplied by the number of cups of soybeans is at least MinIron, and the number of cups of spinach exceeds the number of cups of soybeans.

FiberSpinach.description: Number of units of fiber in one cup of spinach

IronSpinach.description: Amount of iron (mg) in one cup of spinach

CaloriesSpinach.description: Number of calories in one cup of spinach

FiberSoybeans.description: Number of units of fiber in one cup of soybeans

IronSoybeans.description: Amount of iron (mg) in one cup of soybeans

CaloriesSoybeans.description: Number of calories in one cup of soybeans

MinFiber.description: Minimum total units of fiber required

MinIron.description: Minimum total amount of iron required (mg)

CupsSpinach.description: The number of cups of spinach

CupsSoybeans.description: The number of cups of soybeans

constraints.description: FiberSpinach multiplied by the number of cups of spinach plus FiberSoybeans multiplied by the number of cups of soybeans is at least MinFiber.
IronSpinach multiplied by the number of cups of spinach plus IronSoybeans multiplied by the number of cups of soybeans is at least MinIron.
The number of cups of spinach exceeds the number of cups of soybeans.

objective.description: Total caloric intake is CaloriesSpinach multiplied by the number of cups of spinach plus CaloriesSoybeans multiplied by the number of cups of soybeans. The objective is to maximize the total caloric intake.
